title: Welcome to Seattle Healing Acupuncture
author: Seattle Healing Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Medical Qigong Treatments & Classes
cleaned_text: Welcome to Seattle Healing Acupuncture Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Medical Qigong Treatments & Classes Welcome to Seattle Healing Acupuncture Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Medical Qigong Treatments & Classes Signed in as: filler@godaddy.com Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Medical Qigong Treatments & Classes Acupuncture, Herbal Medicine, Medical Qigong Treatments & Classes At Seattle Healing Acupuncture, we are dedicated to providing you with the highest quality of care and service possible. We have created a calm and relaxing environment where you will feel comfortable, safe, and welcome. The approach at Seattle Healing Acupuncture is to treat the whole system and provide lasting results through a joint effort between patient and practitioner. We encourage individuals to take part in their own healthcare with the guidance and support of highly skilled practitioners trained in Traditional Chinese Medicine. We use Acupuncture, Chinese herbal medicine, nutritional advice, cupping, moxa, qigong exercises, and medical qigong treatments to aid in the healing process. These modalities are tailored to you individually and treat your specific TCM diagnosis. To enhance the results of your treatment, it is highly recommended but not necessary to have a daily qigong and/or meditation practice. At Seattle Healing Acupuncture, we offer qigong classes to get you started with a daily home practice. We also offer private qigong sessions to further customize your practice to be focused on your specific condition or concern, either physically, mentally, or emotionally. Sign up to hear about .
